mapper.insert: insert into cfg_page_module (id, module_id, page_id, `type`, `row`, col, `alias`, width, sort, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{row,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{col,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update cfg_page_module set module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, `row` = #{row,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, col = #{col,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, `alias` = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, width = #{width,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, module_id, page_id, `type`, `row`, col, `alias`, width, sort, create_date from cfg_page_module
